> For the client
> programmer, public == published; and wishing otherwise ain't going to
> make it so.

Wishing won't, educating might.

> For instance, why are the junit.samples
> and junit.tests packages published in the JavaDoc on the JUnit web
> site at http://www.junit.org/junit/javadoc/3.8.1/index.htm ?

Probably because noone thought of it as a problem big enough worth solving.

Cheers, Ilja
